item.title: Hack: Pidgin-Gtalk Connection Problems - Get Around The Corporate Firewall
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: I recently wrote a simple answering machine program/plugin for pidgin and someone asked me to port it to 32 bit. So I fired up pidgin within my virtual box installation at work (as I have only a 64 bit machine at home) but couldn’t get it to connect. Tried all sorts of methods found over the net of changing ports etc, set port forwarding in Virtual Box NAT, even switched to using a bridged host interface but still no go.
